machines.name: ECL Machine-1 Uflex
observations: Wiring of heaters and thermocouples was not found in Good condition.
activities: The thermocouples of both barrel were placed properly as much as possible.
conclusions: The wiring and Thermocouple need to be replaced.
The heaters which will be faulty will need to be replaced with new.
Machine need to be kept neat and tidy whenever possible.

machines.name: ECL Machine-3 Huilong
machines.problemReported: Mica Patches at higher speed, improper drying, not able to run machine at higher speed.
observations: The coating Roller bearings and shaft was found damage.
Complete seizure of Doctor Blade assembly was found.
Play in gear and shaft of Rubber roller.
activities: Doctor blade applied on Coating Cylinder.
Rubber roller gear was removed due to damage of gear teeth.
conclusions: The Bearing shaft of Coating Cylinder was not Properly rectified by the vendor, need to get it repaired or new coating roller need to be replaced.
New gear of Coating cylinder and rubber roller need to be Fixed.
Doctor blade assembly and tray need to be maintained properly and need to be cleaned once in 10 days.
